name: Cat Poke
description:
Cat Poke is a puzzle platformer staring Molly, a little girl who is stuck indoors on a rainy day. Luckily, she has 9 cats in the house to play with. The kitties are hidden around the house, so Molly will need to collect tools and think creatively in order to poke all the cats.

Cat Poke was designed for the A Game By Its Cover (AGBIC) competition organized by Melly at The Independent Gaming Source (TIG). The premise of the competition was to design a game based upon a previously existing fictitious game cartridge. Cat Poke was based upon Neko Touch by Olulu Up.
